prompts.title: Can you note a way you have evolved professionally over the past few months?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How can you turn a recent idea or insight into an experiment?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you approach disagreement in a way that strengthens trust?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you balance humility with confidence in your work?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you connect your day-to-day actions to a larger purpose?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you decide what is worth pursuing and what can wait?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you define a "good outcome" beyond personal success?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you distinguish between what's urgent and what's truly important?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you evaluate whether a decision was good — aside from its outcome?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you evaluate whether your work is making a meaningful difference?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you help others think more clearly or work more effectively?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you know when to push through versus when to pause?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you maintain your focus and energy throughout your workday?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you make sure that what you experience or try actually turns into learning?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you notice early signs of fatigue or overload?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you recognize that your energy or focus is running low, and what usually restores it?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you remind yourself of your competence when doubt appears?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you remind yourself why the work matters when progress feels slow?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you simplify complex choices without oversimplifying reality?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you track your evolution as a professional beyond metrics or output?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you turn small wins into lasting improvement?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you typically approach decisions when the right answer isn't obvious?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you typically recognize that you're avoiding something important?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: How do you usually become aware of your own patterns of thinking or reacting while working?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: If I strip away everything non-essential, what remains as the real problem?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What allows you to keep going when a task or goal demands sustained effort?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What aspect of your work feels unclear at the moment, and what would greater clarity look like?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What assumption am I making that, if false, would change everything?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What boundaries protect your attention and recovery time?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What boundary could you set to protect a block of focused time?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What conditions help a group you're in reach its best thinking?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What could you remove from your workflow to regain focus and clarity?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What did you recently discover or realize that could make your future work easier or more effective?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What do you believe makes collaboration effective and rewarding?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What do you do when you sense confusion or uncertainty about your work or direction?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What does "acting confidently" look like for you — regardless of how you feel?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What does professional growth mean to you, and how do you recognize it in yourself?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What does professional success look like to you?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What experience recently reminded you that you're capable — even if only for a moment?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What feedback do you tend to resist, and why?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What feels most important to accomplish right now, and what tells you that you're moving closer to it?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What habit supports consistency more than motivation?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What helps you direct your attention to what truly matters in your work?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What helps you notice when a decision is being driven by bias or emotion?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What helps you recover motivation after a setback or period of stagnation?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What helps you trust your abilities when facing something uncertain or challenging?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What inner signal tells you that you're not working in alignment with your best self?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What is the single clearest question I need to answer about my current situation?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What kind of preparation or ritual boosts your sense of readiness?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What makes you a valuable teammate — and how can you lean into that more often?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What outcome are your current actions really leading toward?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What part of your recent work had a positive effect on others or on the outcome, even in a small way?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What pattern connects what you've been learning across projects or topics?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What principle or rule-of-thumb guides you when data is incomplete?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What recent challenge stretched your skills in a useful way?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What routine helps you reset your mind between tasks?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What signal tells you it's time to pause and reset before productivity drops?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What situations tend to reveal the most about your strengths and blind spots?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What small daily action contributes most to your mental clarity?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What small improvement could make your contribution more visible or useful?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What value do you want your work to create for others or for the organization?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What would "enough progress" look like right now?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What would an objective observer say is the biggest ambiguity here?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What would make this week feel meaningfully productive?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What's one capability you want to develop, and what first move supports it?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What's one thing you avoided this week?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What's the best use of your next hour of undistracted work?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: What's the smallest skill you could practice briefly each day to improve?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: When did collaboration feel effortless recently, and what conditions made that possible?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: When during your work do you notice your attention is strongest, and what seems to make that possible?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: When progress feels slow, what helps you keep moving forward — or return to momentum?
prompts.author: @loicboset

prompts.title: Who could you ask one precise question to accelerate your understanding?
prompts.author: @loicboset

templates.title: Weekly Reflection
prompts: What progress are you most proud of?
What did you learn about your work or yourself?
What should you take into next week?
What should you focus on next week?
What would make the biggest impact?
templates.author: @loicboset
